contest-event.event-date: Oct. 14, 1972 D National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship A Kensington Concerto Royal Albert Hall, Kensington, Kensington and Chelsea, Greater London, England, UK A Baton of Honour was presented to the winning conductor. The Insignia of Honour was awarded to Norman Ashcroft.
